law.catch_line: Governor or his designee to approve contracts.
law.text: Before any contract authorized by KRS 197.120 becomes effective, it shall be approved by the Governor, or his designee in the Finance and Administration Cabinet, in writing.
law.history: Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 497, sec. 20, effective July 13, 1990. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3828b-15.
